subject: Soccer
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The suspension came after U.S. Soccer learned through news reports that Solo was present and reportedly arguing with the police when her husband was arrested for driving under the influence on Monday.
snippet: The suspension came after U.S. Soccer learned through news reports that Solo was present and reportedly arguing with the police when her husband was arrested for driving under the influence on Monday.
